SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Number of passenger kilometers in an average trip (in a year (irrelevant)) based on flight distances of busiest flight routes
Assumptions: This is the number of p-kms that a single trip (implementation unit) provides (in a year, irrelevant). 80% domestic and 20% international flights for business trips. Distance estimated from http://www.icao.int/environmental-protection/CarbonOffset/Pages/default.aspx
